entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
